about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the mystical yet cozy world of the "Vivid Tale"!

There was only Darkness. But one day, the gods appeared. They cleansed the world of this Darkness, divided the lands among themselves and created people. Then the gods left, leaving behind their chosen ones, the Idols. The "Vivid Tale" will introduce you to the story of the Idols of Sclavinia, the largest country on the continent.

You will experience two major campaigns.

In the first campaign, you will meet Seaver, a former Idol and veteran of the eastern wars. After the tsar's death, he descended into idleness and drinking, but everything changes when a young man claiming to be the royal heir approaches him. Seaver must gather the "old guard" and embark on a journey to regain his faith in himself and find his true path.

In the second campaign, you will encounter Mira, the daughter of the late supreme Idol. She returns to Sclavinia after a long stay in foreign lands. Mira must rediscover her homeland, understand if there is a place for her in it, and accept her destiny.

  • Two extensive campaigns with a vivid storyline await you, inspired by the best JRPGs of the PS2 and Dreamcast eras. Explore a well-crafted world filled with the spirit of Slavic mythology and the legends of minority peoples.

  • Complete numerous engaging side quests and meet dozens of colorful characters, each with their own unique story and personality.

  • Enjoy simple yet captivating turn-based battles that combine the best elements of classic and modern JRPGs.

  • Enjoy the stunning card art created by artists from around the world, and immerse yourself in a cozy atmosphere with professional voice acting and a soulful guitar soundtrack. Ready to embark on an unforgettable journey?

Dive into the captivating world of the "Vivid Tale" and become a part of its story!

name: Vivid Tale Demo
short_description: Dive into a cozy RPG with classic turn-based combat! Hear the Vivid Tale and let the cards guide you to Sklavinia, a land ruled by the chosen of the gods. Battle monsters, explore mysterious lands, and shape the fate of the continent!
supported_languages:
English, Russian*, French, Polish
*languages with full audio support
